wikipedia_page.main: John Coubrough Christie (8 February 1881 – 21 November 1934) was a Scottish professional footballer who played as a right-back and left half in The Football League for rivals Manchester United and Manchester City. He also played in the Southern League for Bradford Park Avenue, Croydon Common and Brentford.

response: * John Christie (footballer, born 1929) (1929–2014), Scottish football goalkeeper who played for Southampton
